creditline: Gift of Gordon Locksley and George Shea
description: Volume of 60 drawing reproductions with 3 original etchings (a second suite of the prints plus one drawing is intending for this part of the edition. Only the 3 etchings of the second suite are included). Former Classification: Prints - Portfolio
medium: Etchings and photomechanical reproductions of drawings; housed loose in portfolio
provenance: Gordon Locksley and George T. Shea, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1969.
title: Drawings for the Iliad
